00041   struct LtDirEntry {
00042     bool operator()(const struct DirEntry &de1, const struct DirEntry &de2) const {
00043       if (de1.name == de2.name)
00044         return (int)de1.is_dir < (int)de2.is_dir;
00045       return de1.name < de2.name;
00046     }
